title: Wings
description: Laurel was mesmerized, staring at the pale things with wide eyes. They were terrifyingly beautifulâ€”too beautiful for words.Laurel turned to the mirror again, her eyes on the hovering petals that floated beside her head. They looked almost like wings.In this extraordinary tale of magic and intrigue, romance and danger, everything you thought you knew about faeries will be changed forever.
author: Aprilynne Pike
